Translations.Text: Apani apanara sumahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna
yini [1] srsti karena [2] atahpara suthama karena
Ara yini nirdharana karena [1] atahpara pathanirdesa karena
ara yini trnadi utpanna karena
pare ta dhusara abarjanaya parinata karena
Sighra'i amara apanake patha karaba, phale apani bhulabena na
allah ya icche karena ta chara [1]. Niscaya tini janena ya prakasya o ya gopaniya
Ara amara apanara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha
Atahpara upadesa yadi phalaprasu haya tabe upadesa dina
ye bhaya kare se'i upadesa grahana karabe
Ara ta upeksa karabe ye nitanta hatabhagya
ye bhayabaha agune dagdha habe
tarapara sekhane se marabe'o na bamcabe'o na
Abasya'i saphalya labha karabe ye parisud'dha haya
Ebam tara rabera nama smarana kare o salata kayema kare
Kintu tomara duniyara jibanake pradhan'ya da'o
athaca akhirata'i utkrsta [1] o sthayi
Niscaya eta ache purbabarti sahiphasamuhe
ibrahima o musara sahiphasamuhe
Apanara kache ki acchannakarira (kiyamatera) sambada eseche
sedina aneka cehara habe abanata
klista, klanta
tara prabesa karabe jbalanta agune
taderake atyanta usna prasrabana theke pana karano habe
tadera jan'ya khadya thakabe na kamtayukta gulma chara
ya taderake pusta karabe na ebam tadera ksudha nibrtta karabe na
Aneka mukhamandala sedina habe anandojjbala
nijedera kajera saphalye paritrpta
su'ucca jannate
sekhane tara asara bakya sunabe na
sekhane thakabe bahamana prasrabana
sekhane thakabe unnata [1] sayyasamuha
ara prastuta thakabe panapatra
sari sari upadhana
ebam bichana galica
tabe ki tara takiye dekhe na utera dike, kibhabe ta srsti kara hayeche
ebam asamanera dike, kibhabe ta urdhbe sthapana kara hayeche
ebam parbatamalara dike, kibhabe ta pratisthita kara hayeche
ebam bhutalera dike, kibhabe ta bistrta kara hayeche
ata'eba apani upadesa dina; apani to kebala ekajana upadesa data
apani tadera upara sakti prayogakari nana
Tabe ke'u mukha phiriye nile o kuphari karale
allah taderake debena mahasasti
Niscaya tadera phire asa amadera'i kache
tarapara tadera hiseba-nikesa amadera'i kaja
Sapatha phajarera
sapatha dasa ratera
sapatha jora o bejorera
sapatha ratera yakhana ta gata haye thake –[1]—
niscaya'i era madhye sapatha rayeche bodhasampanna byaktira jan'ya
Apani dekhenani apanara raba ki (acarana) karechilena ‘ada bansera
irama gotrera prati [1]--- yara adhikari chila su'ucca prasadera
yara samatulya kono dese srsti kara hayani
Ebam samudera prati?- Yara upatyakaya [1] pathara kete ghara nirmana karechila
ebam kilaka'oyala phira‘a'unera prati
yara dese simalanghana karechila
atahpara sekhane asanti brd'dhi karechila
Phale apanara raba tadera upara sastira kasaghata hanalena
Niscaya apanara raba satarka drsti rakhena
Manusa to erupa ye, tara raba yakhana take pariksa karena sam'mana o anugraha dana kare, takhana se bale, ‘amara raba amake sam'manita karechena [1].’
Ara yakhana take pariksa karena tara riyka sankucita kare, takhana se bale, ‘amara raba amake hina karechena.’
Kakhano naya [1]. Baram [2] tomara iyatimake sam'mana kara na
ebam tomara misakinake khadyadane parasparake utsahita kara na
ara tomara uttaradhikarera sampada sampurnarupe kheye phela
ara tomara dhana-sampada khuba'i bhalabasa
kakhano naya [1]. Yakhana yaminake curna- bicurna kara habe
ara yakhana apanara raba agamana karabena o saribad'dhabhabe pherestagana'o
ara sedina jahannamake ana habe [1], sedina manusa smarana karabe, takhana e smarana tara ki kaje asabe
se balabe, ‘haya! Amara e jibanera jan'ya ami yadi kichu agrima pathatama?”
Sedina tamra sastira mata sasti ke'u dite parabe na
ebam tamra bamdhara mata bamdhate ke'u parabe na
He prasanta atma
tumi tomara rabera kache phire asa santusta o santosabhajana haye
atahpara amara bandadera antarbhukta ha'o
ara amara jannate prabesa kara
